lines.line: This is the story of Whiskers, a cat who survived against all odds.
When we found him, he was barely breathing, his tiny body covered in ash from the fire that took his home.
The vet wasn't sure he would make it through the night.
But with round-the-clock care and gentle handling, Whiskers began to show signs of improvement.
Days turned into weeks, and his playful spirit slowly returned.
Now, Whiskers has found his forever home with us.
Though he still bears the scars of his past, in our arms, he finally feels safe again.

parsed_script.full_script: This is the story of Whiskers, a cat who survived against all odds. When we found him, he was barely breathing, his tiny body covered in ash from the fire that took his home. The vet wasn't sure he would make it through the night. But with round-the-clock care and gentle handling, Whiskers began to show signs of improvement. Days turned into weeks, and his playful spirit slowly returned. Now, Whiskers has found his forever home with us. Though he still bears the scars of his past, in our arms, he finally feels safe again.
